For those who are a little afraid to go all out this is a nice simple option for harnesses. The single strap is thin and doesn’t take away from the outfit. It is more on the high waisted side so it won’t really cinch at your waist unless its short. You can adjust the shoulder straps a bit but not that much it will significantly drop. Personally not a huge fan of the gold, it doesn’t seem to really fit the vibe of the harness.
It fits right under your bust. I love it, I added the chain. Great quality!

This harness is right under the chest area. It’s waist band is smaller than most harnesses, meaning it’s meant for a smaller waist or torso, but the straps are so classy and the back straps can be worn pushed together or spread apart to create an “x” pattern. The black and gold looks great with many of my other outfits and since it’s so well-made, I can wear it for a long time! Great harness to have in your collection!
